text: nam'mute suvyaktamaya vacanannal avare otikkelppikkukayanenkil satyanisedhikalute mukhannalil verupp prakatamakunnat ninakku manas'silakum. nam'mute vacanannal vayiccukelppikkunnavare kayyerram ceyyanpealum avar mutirnnekkam. parayuka: atinekkalellam deasakaramaya karyam etenn nan ninnalkkariyiccutaratteyea? narakattiyanat. satyatte tallipparannavarkk atan allahu vagdanam ceytittullat. atetra citta sanketam
